A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: For a true die hard Starwars fan I was completely disappointed with this garbage heap of a movie.  Starwars has always been about the Skywalkers now it's about nothing the Skywalker lineage is dead and Disney seriously messed up the movie does not tell us anything about snoke the most powerful being and ren just kills him with a quick lightsaber strike.. are you serious?  Starwars is over for me and part of my childhood has been lost never will I buy a Disney product again.
